meanings.sent1: The ordainer of the ceremony carefully selected the music.
meanings.sent2: The ordainer of the team captain was the coach.
meanings.sent3: The ordainer of the office supplies made sure to include colorful pens.
meanings.sent4: As the ordainer of justice, she ensured fairness for all.
meanings.sent5: The ordainer of the rules was strict but fair.

meanings.sent1: She will ordainer the new leader at the meeting tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The king decided to ordainer a new law for the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly ordainered that pizza would be the official food of the office.
meanings.sent4: The judge ordainered a harsh punishment for the crime committed.
meanings.sent5: The teacher ordainered a surprise quiz to test the students' knowledge.
